trans-unit.source: Enables Windows Forms controls to be bound to ADO recordsets.
trans-unit.target: 使 Windows 窗体控件绑定到 ADO 记录集。

trans-unit.source: This type is a managed equivalent of the Visual Basic 6.0 msbind library.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是 Visual Basic 6.0 msbind 库的托管等效项。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether data has changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据是否已更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data has changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果数据已更改;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a data field.
trans-unit.target: 获取的数据字段。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> that contains the data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref>包含数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data format for a data field.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据字段的数据格式。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp"> </xref>接口。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by an <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by an <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"></xref> and, optionally, releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"> </xref> ，可以选择释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`参数设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数是`true`，此方法释放由该控件引用任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key value for a data field.
trans-unit.target: 为数据字段获取密钥的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> that contains the key value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref>包含关键字的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a data object.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>包含数据。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of a property from a data object.
trans-unit.target: 数据对象中获取属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> that contains the property name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> ，其中包含属性名称。
